author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
text: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.

author: Khalil Gibran
text: We are all like the bright moon, we still have our darker side.

author: Oscar Wilde
text: I knew nothing but shadows and I thought them to be real.

author: Stephen King
text: Quiet people have the loudest minds.

author: Peggy Haymes
text: We numb our minds and heart so one need not be broken and the other need not be bothered.
